General.Name: Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk
General.Description: PT Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk produces and sells pulp. It manages industrial forest plantations. The company was formerly known as PT Inti Indorayon Utama Tbk and changed its name to PT Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk in August 2001. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Medan, Indonesia. PT Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of Pinnacle Company Pte. Ltd.
General.Address: Gedung Uniplaza, East Tower, Medan, Indonesia, 20231
